ygData.subject: Re: Equipped Items
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I didn t know that. Where can I find mesh clothing in size small? The Dagger of Marnek is a magical dagger found on a Necromancer Theurgist in
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I didn't know that. Where can I find mesh clothing in size small?

The Dagger of Marnek is a magical dagger found on a Necromancer Theurgist in
Befallen. It is carried as a main weapon or in a range slot. It grants Int+3
and Mana +15. A must-have for any Necromancer.

Dave

----- Original Message -----
From: David Gulisano <davidg@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 6:08 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Equipped Items


> From: "David Gulisano" <davidg@...>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Dave Ellis <everquest@...>
> To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 4:56 PM
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Equipped Items
>
>
> > From: "Dave Ellis" <everquest@...>
> >
> > Greetings brothers. I am intersted in compiling a list of items that are
> > useful to Necromancers. I am currently wielding a Runed Totem Staff and
> the
> > Dagger of Marnek. Above and beyond that, I'm not clear on what's
> available.
> > I have mostly cloth armor and some wolf-hide armor. Perhaps some others
> > might suggest what is worth questing for. I am a lvl 17-18 Gnome
> > necromancer. Please state the size if applicable. I don't believe there
> are
> > any robes that a trendsetting gnome can wear.
>
>
> I believe woven or net (mesh?) armor is good. Same stats as leather
mostly.
> My Dark Elf is wearing woven right now. plus its magical. About 8 to 5
plat
> per piece. Being 17th i'm sure you probably already know this but Since
you
> asked... :) What is the dagger of Marnek BTW?
>
> -Mazooth
>
>
